title: Shah Jahan mosque
review: Shah Jahan Mosque is wonderful building of Mughal Era this is wonderful place for visit . must see location for everyone

title: Look good from outside
review: We didn't have chance to go inside this mosque but it looks awesome from outside. There are a lot of good restaurant around this place also.

title: Shah jahan's Mosque
review: Shah jahan's Mosque is nice historical building of Ajmer it was built in Mughal Era.  this is nice holy place

title: A Great Place to Visit
review: A beautiful and historic site in a really holy and spiritual location.

title: very very beautiful
review: shahjahan mosque is situated near dargah sharif in ajmer.quite beautiful and superstitious place.Very pleasnt place of worship.

title: Wonderful...
review: It is great to see our historical monuments. This was just amazing experience to visit here. Great atmosphere, Architecture and design was simply beautiful.

title: The important spot inside the mosque !!
review: I come to Dargah Shariff very often and find that each time it is blesding that bring brings here .This well known mosque was constructed centuries ago and even today it is known by the mane of the ruler . It is located inside Dargah - one Can see the score of faithful’s praying here . Strict dress code followed - head to be coveted . Women are are not permitted . A must visit place to experience history and the monument of the devotion here .

title: Beautiful Masjid inside the Dargah....
review: What an amazing open masjid, known and build during the time of emperor Shahjahan, the architecture shows his signature white marble building, the dome of the dargah is also very much visible. Amazing serenity.

title: Inside the Dargah itself; do not miss out!
review: The Iconic mosque; almost at the centre of the Dargah Sharif. Do not forget to visit this while you are inside. Ask people around, they will guide you.

title: Nice place
review: Place of historical importance. If you are on a historical trail do visit the place. Easily accessible by all means of transport.

title: Beautiful mosque
review: A very busy location always crowded with pilgrims

title: Right next to the Dargah sanctum
review: A historic mosque built by Emperor Shahjahan. You can pray here 5 times in peace. Well maintained. Try n be early for Friday prayers as lot of people start taking place inside the mosque almost an hour before the Azaan.

title: Offer your 5 time Namaaz.
review: historic mosque built by Shahjahan, Well maintained and You will get all modern facilities in this mosque, quite beautiful too

title: Place of Historic Importance
review: The Mosque is not only important for its religious belief but its historically important too. Build by Shah Jahan.

title: "Very Nice Mosque"
review: Shah Jahan's Mosque Built by Mughal King Shah Jahan. This Mosque is inside the Dargah sharif and it is Beautiful.

title: Masha Allah
review: Mosques are always great as we can pray for our goods. so no comments only pray for Good and save us from all evil.

title: A clear contrast
review: The mosque seems to be built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan, with whom is associated the history and legend of the Taj Mahal in Agra. This mosque is aesthetically markedly inferior to the famous mausoleum, although for its decoration was used white marble, and the carving on it is made quite competently. However, it stands by the side of the modest tomb of the Sufi Chishti Muinuddin, to which is dedicated the entire complex, and its size is clearly in contrast with it.

title: Typical Mughal architectural style
review: Shah Jahan's Mosque built by Mughal king Shah Jahan is housed within the inner courtyards of the Dargah Sharif. The sanctum has delicate carvings with trellis works. Featuring 11 arches, the mosque has been constructed in typical Mughal architectural style. The marble that went into the making of this mosque was extracted from the same mines in Makrana from where the marble for the Taj Mahal in Agra was sourced.

title: The most place to be humble
review: Entering this sacred place the devotion and prayers are heart felt and seekers experience it . The historical mosque is most people come to sit and pray . The history buffs can relive the history and the lore  of it . If you ever are in Ajmer and inside the Dargah Sherif - you can not fail to notice it When you see a cast number of people praying here .

title: Shajahan's mosque.. worth visiting..
review: Shajahan's mosque located in Ajmer near the dargha is a worth visiting place for the travellers here. We can reach the place by online cabs like uber and it will stop about one kilometer far away from the main gate. After that the travel is through riskshaws which is a good option, as they will help you reach the destination bypassing the crowd. It is built in the name of the mughal emperor shajahan. its located inside the dargha and we can see many people praying infront of it and relieving their worries over there.Altogether it's a good option for the travellers in Ajmer

title: Reflecting Mughal Architectural Style
review: The sanctum of the mosque has delicate carvings with trellis works.Featuring 11 arches,the mosque has been constructed in typical Mughal architectural style.The mosque is topped by a beautiful marble dome.

title: A Part OF Dargah.
review: This mosque is inside the dargah sharif and it is beautiful.

title: Mughal Architecture
review: Shah Jahan's Mosque is housed within the inner courtyards of the Dargah Sharif. Made of white marble, the edifice has a 30.5 metres long and narrow court having a low arcade. The sanctum has delicate carvings with trellis works. Featuring 11 arches, the mosque has been constructed in typical Mughal architectural style.

title: Mughal Marvel
review: Shah jahans mosque as d name says is built by d mughal emperor shahjahan. Its a part of and inside d ajmer sharif dargah. Built in pure white marble its splendid n d artwork is great. Very peaceful and u can go here n find nirvana.

title: Mughal......!
review: Its a typical Mughal architecture!  The styles of the mosque would be amazing for people who have not yet visited Taj Mahal in agra! The sculptures on the marbles are Mind blowing ! A must visit place! This mosque is located just infrnt of the BABUL JANNATH in the Dargah Sharief! This mosque was built by the Mughal emperor Shah Jahan to show his gratitude towards the Sultanul Hind!

title: historical place
review: nice place for experiencing the history located very centrally in the city in naya bazar. the same was very close to hotel payal where i stayed. this hotel was best for its location and quality of rooms
